snippet: Exor, an Italian investment company, is seeking to sway PartnerRe investors to support its unsolicited offer over a merger agreement with Axis Capital.
abstract: DealBook Online; Italian investment company Exor sweetens its offer for reinsurance firm PartnerRe, which is attempting to merge with Axis Capital Holdings.

byline.original: By CHAD BRAY and MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Exor, an Italian investment company, is seeking to sway PartnerRe investors to support its unsolicited offer over a merger agreement with Axis Capital.

headline.main: Exor Revises Its Takeover Bid in Appeal to PartnerRe Investors
